news.title: OPEC+ members agree to larger-than-expected oil production hike in August
news.summary: Eight OPEC+ producers agreed to lift crude output by 548,000 barrels per day in August. That exceeds the anticipated 411,000 barrel per day rate.

news.title: Apple scores big victory with 'F1,' but AI is still a major problem in Cupertino
news.summary: Wall Street's reaction to the company's AI announcements at WWDC suggest there's some trouble underneath the hood. While "F1" was a victory lap for Apple, Wall Street's Reaction to the Company's AI Announcements suggest there may be some trouble ahead.

news.title: Musk backs Sen. Paul's criticism of Trump's megabill in first comment since it passed
news.summary: Musk has blasted President Donald Trump's "One Big Beautiful Bill" Musk has called out the potential for the spending package to increase the national debt.

news.title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman says he's 'politically homeless' in July 4 post bashing Democrats
news.summary: "We should encourage people to make tons of money and then also find ways to widely distribute wealth and share the compounding magic of capitalism," he wrote.

news.title: Ethereum is powering Wall Street's future. The crypto scene at Cannes shows how far it's come
news.summary: Ethernium’s institutional adoption is accelerating. BlackRock, Deutsche Bank, Coinbase, and Kraken all building directly on its rails.

news.title: Investors traded a record $6.6 trillion worth of stock in the first half of 2025
news.summary: Individual investors traded a record amount of stocks in the first half of the year. Tariffs, market volatility and war in the Middle East couldn’t slow down the buying spree.

news.title: Now that the megabill has passed, expect a ton of short-term debt to be sold to finance the government’s deficit
news.summary: Wall Street will be watching to see how new Treasury supply to fund the U.S. deficit will be absorbed. New Treasury supply will be used to pay for new spending programs.

news.title: You’re running out of time to buy an EV before Trump’s big bill kills the $7,500 tax credit on electric vehicles
news.summary: The $7,500 tax credit that car shoppers can use for new EV purchases is set to expire at the end of September. The tax and spending bill passed the House of Representatives on Thursday.

news.title: Will Trump’s megabill cut your taxes? Check this number on your tax return for the answer.
news.summary: Tax breaks in the megabill, like no taxes on tips and overtime, only apply to people at certain income levels. Tax breaks like no tax on tips, overtime, and other benefits are only available to people with certain incomes.

news.title: Tax breaks and spending cuts: Here are the winners and losers in Trump’s big bill
news.summary: The GOP megabill has new tax breaks aimed at low- and moderate-income households. It also has spending cuts that could make it harder for some to receive public assistance or hold onto health insurance.
